alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 5:20PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pueblo County through 545 PM MDT... At 520 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Blende, or 8 miles northeast of Pueblo, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pueblo Depot around 530 PM MDT. Avondale around 540 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
